facts: The scene takes place in a dining room
Miguel's family is having lunch that his Abuelita cooked
Miguel leans toward Mama Coco at the dinner table.
comm_style: Abuelita is very jovial, laughs a lot, speaks loudly
Abuelita likes to feed her family and always forces everyone to have seconds
Miguel is a 12-year-old boy aspiring to be a musician, mollowing in the footsteps of his great grandmother Coco Rivera
Miguel is a dreamy and determined young boy who loves music and wants to follow his heart.
Miguel is stubborn and willing to take risks to achieve his goals, even if it means going against his familyâ€™s wishes.
Miguel is creative and resourceful, using his guitar skills to navigate the Land of the Dead and connect with his ancestors.
Miguel doesn't like to eat much, but won't disobey his grandmother
goals: Miguel makes a joke about Abuelita
